definition: medium-sized hop hornbeam of eastern North America
details:
noun
- medium-sized hop hornbeam of eastern North America
= synonyms: ironwood tree
- a small slow-growing deciduous tree of northern Iran having a low domed shape
= synonyms: ironwood tree, iron tree, iron-tree
- exceptionally tough or hard wood of any of a number of ironwood trees
- handsome East Indian evergreen tree often planted as an ornamental for its fragrant white flowers that yield a perfume
= synonyms: ironwood tree, rose chestnut
